creator: maria.vasilenko@collabio.team

text:
Are you sure you don't have 2 versions of log4j in lib ?
Can you provide jmeter.log and some more information on content of lib and lib/ext ?

Thanks
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Also JMeter 3.3 uses log4j2 2.8 so if you use higher version it is regular that you face issues.
Log4J 2.9 is binary and source incompatible with 2.8.2:
https://github.com/lvc/api-reports-4j/blob/master/report/log4j-core.json

We'll upgrade log4j for JMeter next version (3.4 or 4.0)
